name: Vegetable Cocktail
description: If you’re looking for a great party snack under 200 calories, you’ve found it. It’s not only low in calories, but this Vegetable Skewer Cocktail recipe is incredibly healthy overall.

name: Healthy Salad
description: Whether you are looking for a plant-based meal or a protein-packed healthy bowl, we've compiled a list of mouth-watering healthy salad recipes with a wide variety of palates.

name: Vegetable Beef
description: A food dish that combines beef with a variety of other ingredients, such as vegetables, herbs, spices, and broth to create a savory dish, rich in flavor and often served as the main dish.

name: Healthy Drink
description: Need an alternative to sugary soda? Never fear: there are loads of fantastic alternatives that are healthy drinks! Infused waters, herbal teas, and homemade juices to the rescue!

name: Sushi Food & Drink
description: While there are some popular ingredients like salmon and tuna that can be found year-round, sushi is the perfect example of Japan’s seasonality in cuisine.

name: Brown Coffee
description: During roasting, coffee beans turn from green to tan and then brown. The longer they are roasted, the darker brown beans will be. Roasted coffee beans never become black.
